message: Bob, I have a product that I believe will be of great value to you. It's something I'm very passionate about and I know you'll appreciate its potential. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1,400,000.  This is a fair price that allows you to realize significant value, while also ensuring I receive a good return on my investment. I believe this is a win-win situation for both of us. Please let me know your decision.
